attributes.additional_details:
The idea is to create another part to the average park bench where it can be modified so that the homeless will have somewhere to sleep and not get rained on in the freezing night.

Like in Canada, they have created the perfect design that is accessible and easy to use.

And example is shown in this link: http://i.huffpost.com/gen/1884495/thumbs/n-VANCOUVER-HOMELESS-BUS-BENCH-570.jpg
